alert.note: Alert for Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Walworth and northeastern Rock Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, broadcast media reported a line of strong thunderstorms 8 miles north of Darien, or 8 miles south of Whitewater, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Milton, East Troy, Williams Bay, Genoa City, Walworth, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Darien, Como, Pell Lake, Potter Lake, Powers Lake, Lake Koshkonong, Burlington, Richmond, Springfield and La Grange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
